title: Logo in a street picture
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113053im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Flyer%20Adi%C3%B3s%20a%20Berl%C3%ADn_4476.jpg)

I've found this font and I really wish to know what the name is, my boss asked me to use it for the design of a flyer, but I don't know anything about designing! I just know how to use a little bit of Corel, but that's all. Please help!  
Thank you very much

Font: 

 Choc (regular) 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113053/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: Mouzy

comments.content: It looks like (a compressed & deformed) **[Choc](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113053/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Linotype&ffam=Choc%20-%20Regular&fid=0b4fe77f9d118025952889f6c2b299f7&fsize=60&text=TEDRYS%20teatre&fit=1)** by Roger Excoffon [1955] available from Letraset, Linotype, URW++, Mecanorma Collection, ITC
Oh you're right! THANKS A LOT!!!!!
